website_summaries.verdict: A portable laptop stand boiled down to its most basic, the Just Mobile Lazy Couch has a design flair missing from other laptop risers.
pros: Portable, lightweight, and simple, the oddly named Just Mobile Lazy Couch works with laptops, tablets, or just about anything else
cons: When packed together, the two rubber and aluminum feet are too thick for some slim laptop bags
The height of the feet is fixed, so the angle may not work for you

customer_reviews.title: The most elegant, simple solution for keeping your MacBook Pro cool
customer_reviews.text: This item is one of the most elegant, simple yet effective solutions for keeping your MacBook Pro cool. I use mine with my 2016 15" MacBook Pro while gaming; it tilts the back upward so that all of the vents are entirely free to vent heat. It works beautifully on a lapdesk. It will not scratch the bottom of your MacBook Pro or the lapdesk or other surface you are using. Photos show where I position the Just Mobile Lazy Couch before placing my MacBook Pro on top of them. The tilt is very slight but effective. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: 1st world problems solved
customer_reviews.text: Totally love. Sure they can kill us with the price because it's a work of beautiful design. Use them everyday, I love just having the back raised with two now, really relaxing for hands. But originally I had gotten two pairs and used them for floating the mac on all 4 corners. This is totally brilliant because it lets your mac "breathe" from air flowing underneath + it "floats" it from any surface by about an inch. No more worries about using your laptop on that questionable Starbucks table that has that caramel sticky top on it.
customer_reviews.author: Sebastian

customer_reviews.title: Just what you'd expect
customer_reviews.text: This is a quality product. I'm not sure that I got the best price, but am happy with the product, and free shipping was a plus. It came nicely packaged in a small half-cube box with a pamphlet that I initially mistook for instruction manual (why would I need instructions?) but was a small book of products that Just Mobile makes, all of which look like they would be high quality. The construction seems to be very high quality with an aluminum barrel filled with soft rubber and the feet fit together so that they don't stray apart when you throw them in your bag while on the go. overall I would buy again if I need more of them.
customer_reviews.author: SkyKnight

customer_reviews.title: wonderful little product
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for a week or so, absolutely love it with my Macbook Pro. I've used it on a few different types surfaces, it seems to work equally well with all -- wooden table, tile, glass, etc. It's a compact design, the two pieces fit tightly together when not in use, and look good when in use. One of the things I like but didn't expect was that it puts the Macbook on the perfect angle to keep the edges from digging into my writs after long periods of use. That was an expected plus for me. All in all, a great, inexpensive product.
customer_reviews.author: JLH

customer_reviews.title: needed for cooling
customer_reviews.text: I had bought a couple of white plastic erasers for the same purpose as these things: to provide some ventilation under my laptop. When the laptop is ventilated, I don't have to listen to the fan, the laptop stays cooler, and the laptop runs faster (processors drop to a lower speed when they overheat). While these are 5x-10x the cost of two erasers, they lift higher, don't scoot, are really well designed, nicely finished, sturdy, and durable. If your laptop gets hot and you work on desk surfaces (not laps), these are a great portable and minimalist alternative to cooling systems. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B.

customer_reviews.title: Great feet.
customer_reviews.text: Just throw them in the bag and you are set. I have a few different styles of these portable feet. I think I like these the best as far as looks and stability. But, I mainly use one that has four feet and stores as two rubber balls. I like it since it lifts all four corners. You can not go wrong with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Ok but...
customer_reviews.text: This is a decent idea but it kinda falls short a bit. Love the portability of it. What I don't like is trying to get it so that my laptop is even and not wobbling. Also it seems like every time I lift up my laptop it sticks to it for a millisecond and it moves it so I have to readjust when I put it back on. Haven't found an active stand for heat regulation and typing angle better yet so this works!
customer_reviews.author: Jp007

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Mobile Work
customer_reviews.text: I've used the Lazy Couch on my MacBook and for drawing with my iPad. They are small enough to fit in my bag and they work as advertised. They provide just enough tilt for comfortable typing and drawing. I use them only when mobile.
customer_reviews.author: DuaneWrites

customer_reviews.title: Most Reliable Laptop Lift
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a slight lift for my laptop and this does the job perfectly. They're so minimal and convenient that I can throw them in my bag for the day and use them on the go. All other products that give the same result are so much more expensive and clunky for no reason really. I would highly recommend these to anyone. On a side note, I understand the job could be done with water bottle caps or what have you, but I'm all for supporting small businesses and I feel that these will last me a VERY long time, hopefully throughout the rest of my college career.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant product. Has been great for my posture.
customer_reviews.text: This is a brilliant product. I love the easy storage (they fit together so easily when you are not using them) and that they have a soft tip that does not scratch the Mac. They do not slide and provide good stability for when I want to use my Mac at an angle. This has been incredible for my posture.
customer_reviews.author: Caleb Kierum

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for portablilty.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for me since I'm always taking my macbook on the go. It really makes a difference when I'm rendering out video files and the like as the macbook likes to get pretty hot when running hard.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Grant

customer_reviews.title: Love It!
customer_reviews.text: Simple, elegant, and most importantly...it works! Better air flow under the MacBook Pro consistently lowers operating temperature by 3-4 degrees centigrade and keeps the hot surface of the MacBook from heating up my legs when used it on a lap "table."
customer_reviews.author: therealronn

customer_reviews.title: works well and stores easily. Prevents my laptop from overheating with the right ...
customer_reviews.text: works well and stores easily. Prevents my laptop from overheating with the right amount of elevation for use.
customer_reviews.author: Sydney

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and useful
customer_reviews.text: Just enough elevation for more comfortable keyboard use. The two pieces push together and interlock with rubbery "fingers" for storage. A simple gadget that does the job it is supposed to do.
customer_reviews.author: kwolson

customer_reviews.title: Solid, not fabulous.
customer_reviews.text: I end up spending a lot of time adjusting them as they seem to shift as you use your laptop. Not bad - better for travel because they are so compact, but not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Lehmann

customer_reviews.title: Stupid but useful
customer_reviews.text: I have a keyboard that is nice to use but had feet that would retract if you even looked at moving the keyboard. I tried other things but these stick like glue and my keyboard is always at the correct angle.
customer_reviews.author: A. Backman

customer_reviews.title: These work for me.
customer_reviews.text: I like these a lot and plan to order another pair. I saw that some folk didn't find them too satisfactory but they work well for me and make a real difference in comfort
customer_reviews.author: JHB

customer_reviews.title: Cool idea
customer_reviews.text: This is a great idea, to prop up a laptop and an ipad, of which I have both. It's smaller than I thought, but does the job just fine, as well as it's easy to pack and take along.
customer_reviews.author: Research Queen

customer_reviews.title: Simple, good product to elevate the laptop and keep it cool.
customer_reviews.text: Keeps my laptop at the right angle. Keeps it cool. Light and easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Pazzazz

customer_reviews.title: will be on great typing position
customer_reviews.text: any laptop you use, will be on great typing position, product mentioned to be used for ipad or mac, but I used for a Lenovo yoga 710, and it works just fine, and keeps your pc cold.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome little stands. I take them everywhere and they put my MacBook Pro at the perfect angle to make typing less stressful for my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Ferenc Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: I'm going to be traveling a great deal and working at research libraries
customer_reviews.text: I'm going to be traveling a great deal and working at research libraries. These will help a lot--in fact, I'm ordering a second set!
customer_reviews.author: Marjorie

customer_reviews.title: they keep your macbook off the table and cool and provide a comfortable typing experience
customer_reviews.text: These things are incredible, they keep your macbook off the table and cool and provide a comfortable typing experience, I really recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Omar Siddiqi

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for taking on travels
customer_reviews.text: Works fine providing some ventilation on the bottom of the laptop and some nice angle for typing. Has a small profile to store them in a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: really like it
customer_reviews.text: Granted, you can do the same thing for free but I find this to be classy, convenient and well_made. I keep it in my laptop bag, it's lightweight and takes up very little space. I've got no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: finhead

customer_reviews.title: very very happy..
customer_reviews.text: These are all you need, to keep the air flowing underneath..just what I was looking for....Came fast also...very very happy....
customer_reviews.author: ellen jackson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product. They work great and help prevent overheating while using my laptop.
customer_reviews.author: the quiet one

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, works as described. Provides a good lift for my MacBook, hence, increasing airfllow, which aids in cooling it down during heavy editing.
customer_reviews.author: Asyraf Zakwan

customer_reviews.title: The product is amazing! It's exactly as I thought it would be ...
customer_reviews.text: The product is amazing! It's exactly as I thought it would be and made of great quality. I completely recommend the Mobile Lazy Couch for anyone looking to get it.
customer_reviews.author: N. Sosic

customer_reviews.title: Just Mobile Lazy
customer_reviews.text: I really like how it subtly lifts my computer just enough to be comfortable. I'd recommend it to people who are interested in a lift.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Roman

customer_reviews.title: Good & Useful
customer_reviews.text: It's good to use, especially on travel. Small. Light. Easy to Use. The only weak point is dust stick to the rubber material.
customer_reviews.author: DS Lee

customer_reviews.title: works well & easy to cary
customer_reviews.text: It does what its meant to do. helps my mac book pro stay cool, makes it easier to type, steady and doesn't slip. Its better than having to carries a cooling fan.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy G.

customer_reviews.title: Small :D but great
customer_reviews.text: do not be deceived this product is extremely small! maybe half of inch of length and width but it works great! has alot of grip to not let your laptop fall :D
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Morales

customer_reviews.title: Ah, it hit the spot!
customer_reviews.text: Like the right cup of coffee at the right moment, this gizmo met my need. It is just right for propping up my MBAir.
customer_reviews.author: Occ

customer_reviews.title: not bad...
customer_reviews.text: for some reason, i thought that these "pods" would some how click/snap onto something.. but they dont.. they are free standing so you have to figure out how to place them under your laptop. Dont know why its advertised as a mac accessorie, since it can be used for any device. That being said, it works just fine once you figure out where to place them. A bit over priced for what it is. only cool thing is that they lock together into a ball, which is cool if you like to take them with you.. overall, not overly impressed or disappointed..
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Ramirez

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, but...
customer_reviews.text: It have good quality material, but the foots don't fits the computer well and i need to spent a little time to fit it rightly.
customer_reviews.author: Lawrence Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: umm....ya....
customer_reviews.text: uh... for the price you get something that just basically can be done with two water bottle caps. so.. ya
customer_reviews.author: jay

product_meta.title: Just Mobile Lazy Couch for iPad/MacBook
product_meta.description: Just Mobile Lazy Couch is a mini twin-stand set for iPad and MacBook that provides extra height on the go. It helps elevate iPad and MacBook to an ergonomic viewing and typing level and facilitates a cooler and quieter operation with improved air circulation. Crafted from solid aluminum and soft rubber, both mini stands can be interlocked to a single unit for storage that fits nicely in the palm of your hand, your pocket, or computer bag.
feature_bullets: Couple it for storage, perfect for traveling
Fits most Mac or PC notebook computers
Clip it for storage, perfect for traveling

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.4 out of 5 stars155 ratings4.4 out of 5 stars
